teaser: Airing on Tuesday, January 13, 2015: First up on today's show, we'll talk to Laura Reed, Research Analyst for Freedom House’s Freedom on the Net project, about improving WiFi infrastructure in Cuba. Plus, we'll also speak with Ev Williams, CEO of Medium, about alternative metrics for measuring online news engagement.

title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, January 13, 2015
